goal.en: The 17-week course will be taught by a group of elite professors from various fields of the School of Management, who will share the development and essence of relevant economic and management ideologies in their respective areas of expertise with students in the Political Economy and Philosophy Elite Program. This will enable students to extract and adapt the accumulated wisdom of business and management to develop strategies, conduct negotiations, or persuade others in their future leadership decisions. Some of the topics and contents that may be covered in this course include: 1. The development and evolution of economic and management ideologies: covering the historical development and evolution of various aspects such as legal systems, economics, financial management, market marketing, strategic management, etc., in order to help students understand different management thinking and theories. 2. Business strategy: students may learn how to develop effective business strategies, including how to conduct market research, how to position products or services, how to develop sales and marketing strategies, etc. 3. Digital governance, digital transformation, leadership, and organizational management: this topic may cover principles and techniques of leadership and management, including how to cultivate team culture, manage talent, establish effective workflows, etc. 4. Communication and negotiation skills: students may learn how to communicate and negotiate effectively, including how to use oral and written language, how to resolve conflicts, how to build good relationships, etc. 5. Business ethics and social responsibility: students may learn about the concepts and principles of business ethics and social responsibility, including how to consider ethical and social factors in business decision-making, how to address inequality, how to manage corporate image and reputation, etc.
goal.ch: 17 週的課程將由管理學院各領域的菁英教授群，分別就其專長領域，為菁英領導 elite學程的學生分享相關財經管理思潮的發展演變及其菁要，使其未來在領導決策時，得以提取並因地制宜地巧妙運用商學管理所累積的智慧，擬定策略，進行談判或溝通說服他人。以下是這個課程可能涉及的一些主題和內容： 1. 財經管理思潮的發展演變：涵蓋法律制度、經濟學、財務管理、市場行銷、戰略管理等方面的歷史發展和演變，從而幫助學生了解不同的管理思維和理論。 2. 商業策略：學生可能會學習如何制定有效的商業策略，包括如何進行市場研究、如何定位產品或服務、如何制定銷售和市場推廣策略等。 3. 數位治理、數位轉型、領導力和組織管理：這個主題可能涵蓋領導力和管理的原則和技巧，包括如何培養團隊文化、如何管理人才、如何建立有效的工作流程等。 4. 溝通和談判技巧：學生可能會學習如何有效地溝通和談判，包括如何運用口語和書面語言、如何解決衝突、如何建立良好的關係等。 5. 商業倫理和社會責任：學生可能會學習商業倫理和社會責任的概念和原則，包括如何在商業決策中考慮道德和社會因素，解決不均化，如何管理企業形象和聲譽等。
